Verenigd Koninkrijk
Drama

geregisseerd door James Marsh
met Eddie Redmayne, Felicity Jones en David Thewlis



De film vertelt het verhaal over de beroemde natuurkundige Stephen Hawking.
Het verhaal centreert zich om Hawking's vroege jaren op de Universiteit
van Cambridge waar hij verliefd wordt op de arts-studente Jane, waar hij
later mee trouwt. Net na het huwelijk wordt bij Hawking ALS, een
ongeneeslijke spierziekte, gediagnosticeerd.
 <a href="
http://imagizer.imageshack.com/img538/2711/nuV2ft.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imagizer.imageshack.com/img538/2711/nuV2ft.jpg</a>

The Theory of Everything is the story of the most brilliant 
and celebrated physicist of our time, Stephen Hawking, and 
Jane Wilde the arts student he fell in love with whilst studying 
at Cambridge in the 1960s. Little was expected from Stephen 
Hawking, a bright but shiftless student of cosmology, given 
just two years to live following the diagnosis of a fatal illness 
at 21 years of age. He became galvanized, however, by the 
love of fellow Cambridge student, Jane Wilde, and he went 
on to be called the successor to Einstein, as well as a husband 
and father to their three children. Over the course of their 
marriage as Stephen's body collapsed and his academic renown 
soared, fault lines were exposed that tested the lineaments of their
relationship and dramatically altered the course of both of their lives.
